scripts.mac: npm run mac:intel && npm run mac:arm64 && node macos.js
scripts.mac:test: npx nativefier --platform osx -a universal --name 'Google Messages' 'https://messages.google.com/web' --honest --disable-dev-tools --darwin-dark-mode-support --counter --bounce --tray start-in-tray dist/MacIntel
scripts.mac:intel: npx nativefier --platform osx -a x64 --name 'Google Messages' 'https://messages.google.com/web' --honest --disable-dev-tools --darwin-dark-mode-support --counter --bounce --tray start-in-tray dist/MacIntel
scripts.mac:arm64: npx nativefier --platform osx -a arm64 --name 'Google Messages' 'https://messages.google.com/web' --honest --disable-dev-tools --darwin-dark-mode-support --counter --bounce --tray start-in-tray dist/MacARM64
scripts.windows: npx nativefier --platform windows --name 'Google Messages' 'https://messages.google.com/web' --honest --disable-dev-tools  --tray start-in-tray dist/Windows
scripts.linux: npx nativefier --platform linux --name 'Google Messages' 'https://messages.google.com/web' --honest --disable-dev-tools  --tray start-in-tray dist/Linux
scripts.build:all: npm run mac && npm run windows && npm run linux
